messages.messageBody:
Hi all -

I'm about ready to order a copy of Tsuba Taikan (reprint) from Japan. Before buying from "across the Big Pond" I thought it worth asking if anybody in the states might have a copy of this reprint (and supplimental 2nd volumn) available? Just curious.

Thanks,

Ron
STL

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
